subject: Football
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Nov. 4 (AP) — The Detroit Lions had confidence in themselves back in training camp, when Jon Kitna boldly declared he would be disappointed with anything short of 10 victories.
snippet: DETROIT, Nov. 4 (AP) — The Detroit Lions had confidence in themselves back in training camp, when Jon Kitna boldly declared he would be disappointed with anything short of 10 victories.
